name: Hamburgers In Space
description:
My first jam and first game. I had a lot of fun making this.

Made this for OMGJam4. The game is completely open source on GitHub.

Fight your way through 10 waves of hamburgers, by slicing your way through the enemy. Armed with an infinite supply of pickle slices, you might stand a chance.

I recommend downloading the Windows Build. For some reason the stars are pretty jerky in the WebGL version.
